data.title: Storm Acquisition Definition
data.meta_description: Define Storm Acquisition. means the acquisition by the Borrowers, directly or indirectly, all of the equity interests of Storm Private Holdings I Ltd., a Cayman Islands exempted company (the “Target”), and its Subsidiaries pursuant to the terms of that certain Share Purchase Agreement, dated as of June 28, 2022, by and among the equity holders of the Target party thereto, the Target and the Borrowers.
data.text: Bank consents to the transactions contemplated by the “Agreement and Plan of Merger Among Saba Software, Inc., Storm Holding Corporation, Storm Acquisition Corporation, THINQ Learning Solutions, Inc.
